nodes.text: Want to know how the school-to-prison pipeline works and meet some of the students it impacts? \n\nRead my latest w/ an incredible team for @news21 https://t.co/Gn70MTxWIn

14 y/o Tre'sur Johnson was arrested at school for a fight she said she didn't start. Her mother said she is traumatized, and wouldn't leave the house to buy a new dress for her 8th grade graduation. Read the story to learn more about the lasting effects a school arrest can have. https://t.co/oPxc1vLWMu
